log.text: Checking for recommendations for Metadata in sample.json...

rule.name: ValidateSample
rule.description: Verifies key elements of a list formatting sample

log.text: Verifying all expected files are present (@@SampleKey@@)

or.name: Screenshot
or.failuremessage: Primary screenshot not found (@@SampleKey@@)! assets\screenshot.png (or gif)

or.name: README Screenshot
or.failuremessage: Screenshot not correctly referenced in README (@@SampleKey@@) - should be '![screenshot of the sample](./assets/screenshot.png)' (can also be a .gif)

filecontains.name: README Author
filecontains.failuremessage: README has incorrect Author Table or missing link (@@SampleKey@@) - Looking for '@@AuthorTable@@'

filecontains.name: README Author
filecontains.failuremessage: README might have incorrect Author Table or missing link (@@SampleKey@@) - Looking for '@@AuthorTable@@'

filecontains.name: Telemetry Tag
filecontains.failuremessage: Old Telemetry Tag in README (@@SampleKey@@) - Use https://pnptelemetry.azurewebsites.net/list-formatting/

filecontains.name: Telemetry Tag
filecontains.failuremessage: Telemetry Tag incorrect in README (@@SampleKey@@) - use '@@TelemetryTag@@'

filecontains.name: Sample Not Empty
filecontains.failuremessage: Sample.json is invalid and likely empty (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample Name
jsonquery.failuremessage: name mismatch in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@) - should be 'pnp-list-formatting-@@SampleKey@@'

jsonquery.name: Sample Reponame
jsonquery.failuremessage: reponame mismatch in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@) - should be `@@SampleKey@@'

jsonquery.name: Sample Source
jsonquery.failuremessage: source mismatch in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@) - should be 'pnp'

jsonquery.name: Sample Title
jsonquery.failuremessage: title missing or blank in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample SD
jsonquery.failuremessage: shortDescription missing or blank in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample SD Link
jsonquery.failuremessage: shortDescription cannot contain markdown links (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample Url
jsonquery.failuremessage: url mismatch in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@) - should be '@@SampleUrl@@'

jsonquery.name: Sample LD
jsonquery.failuremessage: longDescription missing or blank in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample LD Link
jsonquery.failuremessage: longDescription cannot contain markdown links (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample Creation
jsonquery.failuremessage: creationDateTime missing or blank in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample Update
jsonquery.failuremessage: updateDateTime missing or blank in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample Products
jsonquery.failuremessage: products missing or blank in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@) - should include 'SharePoint' and 'Microsoft Lists'

jsonquery.name: Sample Products SP
jsonquery.failuremessage: products missing 'SharePoint' in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample Products ML
jsonquery.failuremessage: products missing 'Microsoft Lists' in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample Metadata
jsonquery.failuremessage: metadata missing in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample Type
jsonquery.failuremessage: metadata LIST-SAMPLE-TYPE missing in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@) - should be '@@SampleType@@'

jsonquery.name: Sample Type
jsonquery.failuremessage: LIST-SAMPLE-TYPE mismatch in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@) - should be '@@SampleType@@'

jsonquery.name: Sample Compatibility
jsonquery.failuremessage: metadata SHAREPOINT-COMPATIBILITY missing in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@) - should be some combination of 'SharePoint Online' and/or 'SharePoint 2019'

or.name: Sample Compatibility
or.failuremessage: metadata SHAREPOINT-COMPATIBILITY invalid in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@) - should be some combination of 'SharePoint Online' and/or 'SharePoint 2019' (separate values with a comma and a space)

jsonquery.name: Sample Compatibility SO
jsonquery.failuremessage: metadata SHAREPOINT-COMPATIBILITY not equal to 'SharePoint Online'

jsonquery.name: Sample Compatibility S19
jsonquery.failuremessage: metadata SHAREPOINT-COMPATIBILITY not equal to 'SharePoint 2019'

jsonquery.name: Sample Compatibility All1
jsonquery.failuremessage: metadata SHAREPOINT-COMPATIBILITY not equal to 'SharePoint Online, SharePoint 2019'

jsonquery.name: Sample Compatibility All2
jsonquery.failuremessage: metadata SHAREPOINT-COMPATIBILITY not equal to 'SharePoint 2019, SharePoint Online'

jsonquery.name: Sample Categories
jsonquery.failuremessage: metadata SAMPLE-CATEGORIES missing in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample Column Type
jsonquery.failuremessage: metadata LIST-COLUMN-TYPE missing in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample Tokens
jsonquery.failuremessage: metadata FORMATTING-TOKENS missing in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample Operators
jsonquery.failuremessage: metadata FORMATTING-OPERATORS missing in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample Actions
jsonquery.failuremessage: metadata FORMATTING-ACTIONS missing in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample Features
jsonquery.failuremessage: metadata FORMATTING-FEATURES missing in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample Classes
jsonquery.failuremessage: metadata CLASSES missing in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample Thumbnail
jsonquery.failuremessage: At least one thumbnail entry is required in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@) - use

or.name: Sample Thumbnail
or.failuremessage: First thumbnail entry in sample.json should be the primary screenshot (gif or png) referenced from raw.githubusercontent.com (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample Author
jsonquery.failuremessage: At least one author entry is required in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample Author GH
jsonquery.failuremessage: A gitHubAccount is required for at least the first author (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample Author Picture
jsonquery.failuremessage: A pictureUrl is required for at least the first author (@@SampleKey@@) - use 'https://github.com/authorusername.png'

jsonquery.name: Sample Author Picture
jsonquery.failuremessage: A name is required for at least the first author (@@SampleKey@@)

jsonquery.name: Sample References
jsonquery.failuremessage: references missing in sample.json (@@SampleKey@@)

filecontains.name: $schema
filecontains.failuremessage: Column Formatting $schema declaration missing/invalid or formatting is off (2 spaces) (@@Each@@) - use '@@ColumnSchemaUrl@@'

filecontains.name: $schema
filecontains.failuremessage: Column Formatting (AST) $schema declaration missing/invalid or formatting is off (2 spaces) (@@Each@@) - use '@@ColumnSchemaUrlAST@@'

or.name: $schema
or.failuremessage: View Formatting $schema declaration missing/invalid or formatting is off (2 spaces) (@@Each@@)

and.name: Extra Space
and.failuremessage: There appears to be extra space on the end of a JSON property (@@Each@@)

regexmatches.name: Extra Space
regexmatches.failuremessage: There appears to be extra space at the beginning of a JSON property (@@Each@@)

rule.name: ValidateSamples
rule.description: Validates each list formatting sample. Set starting path to the root project
